info.name: Admin Stall Booking Management
info.description: Admin API endpoints for stall booking setup and category management

request.description: Get stall booking setup details with all categories for a specific event

  "booking_deadline": "2026-05-30T23:59:59Z",

  "categories": [

        "wifi": true,

        "chairs": 2
      },

    },
    {
      "category_name": "Premium Stall",

request.description: Create or update stall booking setup and its categories in one API call. If categories have 'id', they will be updated; otherwise, new categories will be created. The setup is automatically created/updated based on event_id.

item.name: Update Stall Booking with Existing Categories

  "event_id": 1,
  "booking_deadline": "2026-06-15T23:59:59Z",

request.description: Update existing setup and mix update/create categories. Include 'id' in category object to update existing one, omit 'id' to create new category.
Upload or replace brochure for stall booking setup. This will replace any existing brochure.

formdata.description: Send 'null' as string to remove brochure

request.description: Remove brochure from stall booking setup. Send brochure='null' as text to delete the file.
Delete a stall category. Cannot delete if there are existing bookings for this category.
